author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Backport #40865 to CMSSW_13_0_X for additional Run3 files needed as the step1 for making 2023 geometry payload

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is backport of #40865
title: Run3-gex155X Backport #40865 to CMSSW_13_0_X for additional Run3 files needed as the step1 for making 2023 geometry payload
